tool_description: Analyzes image quality metrics including sharpness, brightness, contrast, noise levels, and blur detection to assess suitability for object detection annotation.

image_paths.description: List of image file paths to analyze for quality

metrics.description: Quality metrics to compute: sharpness, brightness, contrast, noise, blur

sample_regions.description: Number of image regions to sample for analysis (1-25)

error_messages: Invalid image path: One or more image paths do not exist or are not accessible.
Invalid metrics: Metrics must be from [sharpness, brightness, contrast, noise, blur].
Sample regions error: sample_regions must be an integer between 1 and 25.
Analysis failed: Quality analysis failed due to corrupted or invalid image file.
usage: Provide image_paths array and optionally specify which quality metrics to compute and number of sample_regions. Tool analyzes each image and returns quality scores.

quality_scores.description: Array of JSON-formatted quality score objects for each image

average_quality.description: Overall average quality score across all images

low_quality_count.description: Number of images flagged as low quality

quality_distribution.description: Distribution of quality scores across the dataset
